forum.name: Formative Assessment Application Project
forum.intro:
In Session 2.5, we discussed several ways for engaging learners in the assessment process. In this activity, you will select one of these strategies and implement it with your students.

  1. Select one of these routines, or a different routine serving the same purpose, and implement it with your students:
    • Journaling
    • Check-In Chats/Coffee Talks
    • Rubrics and Peer Feedback
    • Alternative Feedback Strategies
  2. In the discussion forum below, share your experience using one of the formative assessment routines. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum.
    • Describe the routine.
    • Explain why you selected it.
    • Describe how you modified the technique to meet the needs of your learners.
    • Discuss how the learners responded.
    • Say whether you will, or will not, use the technique again and why.
